title: Cover, early 20th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: cutwork with needle-made fillings; deflected element work; withdrawn element work; satin, overcast stem, buttonhole, and buttonhole stitch over a loop on plain weave; foundation fabric cut away after buttonhole stitch outline comp
description: Long rectangular cover with deep cutwork and embroidered border at both ends in a pattern of a vertically symmetrical urn and flowering vine.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cover, early 20th century.Medium: linen
Technique: cutwork with needle-made fillings; deflected element work; withdrawn element work; satin, overcast stem, buttonhole, and buttonhole stitch over a loop on plain weave; foundation fabric cut away after buttonhole stitch outline comp. 1979-66-17.
